sourcesContent: import React,{useEffect} from 'react'; import Aos from 'aos'; import 'aos/dist/aos.css'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Container, Button } from '../../globalStyles'; import { InfoSec, InfoRow, InfoColumn, TextWrapper, TopLine, Heading, Subtitle, Smallimg, ImgWrapper, Img, } from './InfoSection.elements'; function InfoSection({ primary, lightBg, topLine, lightTopLine, lightText, lightTextDesc, headline, description, buttonLabel, img, smallimg, imgpolygon, alt, imgStart, start, AOS }) { useEffect(() => { Aos.init({duration:2000}); }, []) return ( <> {topLine} {headline} {description} {/* */} ); } export default InfoSection;
